      • config

        public SimpleRetryPolicy.Builder config​(Config metaConfig)
        Update this builder from meta configuration.

        Mandatory properties, see RetryPolicies.repeat(int):

        • retries - type int
        Optional properties:
        • delay - type Duration, see delay(Duration)
        • delay-factor - type double, see delayFactor(double)
        • call-timeout - type Duration, see callTimeout(Duration)
        • overall-timeout - type Duration, see overallTimeout(Duration)
        Parameters:
        metaConfig - meta configuration used to update this builder
        Returns:
        updated builder instance
